name: autohide the menu & sidebar [Financial Post]
description: Hides the Financial Post's header, footer, and sidebar. (But not permanently - hover at the edges of the screen to restore them.)
additional_info: The thin vertical strips at the left edge of the screen are the collapsed header, footer, and sidebar. Mouse over them to restore the element. These same changes are applied to the National Post, which is nearly identical. In fact this style is identical to style 93566, so don't install both of them.
